About Us

Babs Labs Creative Studios

Bio

Babs Labs is experienced in a wide variety of aspects of web development ranging from website design and management to marketing and graphic design. Babs Labs has developed web content for a variety of industries on the most popular platforms such as WordPress, Shopify, and SquareSpace as well as by custom desigining, building, and deploying websites.

Technological Skill Set

Very Familiar

  • HTML5
  • CSS
  • Git
  • GitHub

Familiar

  • Visual Studio Code
  • SASS
  • JavaScript
  • Photoshop

Somewhat Familiar

  • Adobe XD
  • ES6

Front End Developer

The Denver Folklore Center
2012 - 2019

In my time at The Denver Folklore Center I have helped implement an online sales portal with e-commerce integrated capabilities which has been quite successful. The process to build an online presence involved a full renovation of our online platforms, complete new graphics, and starting partnerships with other online music themed sites.

Accomplishments:

  1. Developing and maintaining an e-commerce capable website with integrated point of sales system
    • Worked with web designers, photographers, and vendors to create content
  2. Lead graphic designer and digital content manager
  3. Establishing and managing the Denver Folklore Center Newsblast Newsletter email marketing campaigns
    • Has a 31% average open rate vs the Music Industry average of 18%
    • Over 1300 subscribers in 15 different countries

Graphic Designer

The UPS Store
2008 - 2013

At the UPS Store I headed the Graphic and Print Design Department where I designed, distributed, and printed custom graphics for clients in print and digital formats.

Accomplishments

  1. Established the graphic design department for print and digital media
  2. Scheduled and managed logistics of domestic and international shipping and receiving
